TYPE SleepPod
RENDERER GeneralA
RENDERER GeneralD
TILEBLOCK Pod
BUILDABLE INSIDE OUTSIDE
REQUIRES FOUNDATION 1
COST ENERGY 4 METAL 4 TIME 5
WINDBLOCK 10
ROTATABLE TRUE
SOUND Door VOLUME 0.6 FADE 0.1
